components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Oman Ooredoo Network

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Oman Ooredoo network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 11:05 PST until 23 November 2022 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 12:00 PST until 23 November 2022 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 12:00 PST until 23 November 2022 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 13:00 PDT until 23 November 2022 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 16:00 PST until 23 November 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 22:00 PST until 24 November 2022 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2022 at 22:00 PST until 23 November 2022 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio France phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Europe is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 November 2022 at 11:00 PST until 24 November 2022 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures or disconnections to and from Europe handset.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 November 2022 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2022 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 November 2022 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2022 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2022 at 01:00 PST until 28 November 2022 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of longcodes.
Belgium
USA/Guam
Poland
Austria

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2022 at 05:00 PST until 28 November 2022 at 12:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile handsets

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 28 November 2022 at 05:00 PDT until 28 November 2022 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2022 at 13:00 PDT until 28 November 2022 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2022 at 14:00 PST until 28 November 2022 at 21:00 PST, During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from France Bouygues Telecom handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 November 2022 at 13:00 PDT until 30 November 2022 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 5 December 2022 at 05:00 PDT until 5 December 2022 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 November 2022 at 21:00 PDT until 01 December 2022 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

Please Note :

The above maintenance period comprises tasks that will be carried out twice a week on the following date and times:
Nov 3, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 4, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 7, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 8, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 9, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 10, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 14, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 15, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 16, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 17, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 21, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 22, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 22, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 23, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 30, 2022 21:00 PDT to Dec 1, 2022 01:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting a planned maintenance from 03 November 2022 at 21:00 PDT until 01 December 2022 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Please Note :

The above maintenance period comprises tasks that will be carried out twice weekly on the following dates and times:
Nov 3, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 4, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 7, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 8, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 9, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 10, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 14, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 15, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 16, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 17, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 21, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 22, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 22, 2022 21:00 PDT to Nov 23, 2022 01:00 PDT
Nov 30, 2022 21:00 PDT to Dec 1, 2022 01:00 PDT
